content: Operating expenses for second quarter of 2022 were RMB 139.4 million, up 46% year-over-year. Excluded share-based compensation expenses amortization of acquired intangible assets, gain on disposals of subsidiaries and impairment of goodwill, non-GAAP operating expenses were RMB 55.7 million, down 38% year-over-year. Research and product development expenses for second quarter of 2022 were RMB 14 million, up 1% year-over-year. Sales and marketing expenses for the second quarter of 2022 were RMB 24.5 million, down 45% year-over-year. Non-GAAP net loss attributable to ordinary shareholders, which excluded share-based compensation expenses, amortization of acquired intangible assets, gain on disposals of subsidiaries and impairment of goodwill was RMB 42.6 million in the second quarter of 2022.
